GrindCraft Unblocked

Grindcraft game is the new and improved edition of the famous minecraft-inspired clicker game Grindcraft. Grind your way through items and worlds. Mine resources from the overworld, harvest and gather crops from the field, and fight mobs for various other items.
Platforms
Web browser (desktop and mobile)
Features
Endless grinding and crafting experience
Hundreds of achievements to be unlocked
Craft your buildings, weapons, people and much more
Release Date
August 2018

Controls
Use your mouse to play this game.
